name: The N
description:
BETA

Please report us every bug you find! (Here)

Known Bugs in this Version (Monthly Build MAY17):

- Maybe the initial reset crashes

These Bugs will be fixed in the next monthly build!

The next monthly build is JUN17, which will be released in June 2017
Test pre-releases of the next build here.

Join us on Discord and decide how the story continues!

You can also help us translating the game in other languages. If you want to, contact us on Discord

[ENG]

The N is a point and click game based on our nEngine.

It offers:

  • Beautiful Graphics drawn by us
  • Funny dialogues
  • Some nice details
  • And much more

Please note that only the first two chapters are included in this beta, because the game is still in development! As soon as we finish chapter 1.3 we'll release it here.

[DE]

The N ist ein point and click Spiel, dass auf unserer nEngine basiert.

Es bietet:

  • Schöne, selbst gezeichnete Grafiken
  • Witzige Dialoge
  • Ein paar nette Details
  • und vieles mehr

Bitte beachtet, dass in dieser beta nur die ersten beiden Kapitel enthalten sind, da das Spiel noch in Entwicklung ist! Sobald wir Kapitel 1.3 fertig haben, werden wir es hier veröffentlichen.

Changes in the May 2017 build:

  • more UI redesign
  • More story (chapter 1.2 is better now)
  • An Updater
  • Better settings
  • Some new cool features
